app_descript:
Habitica

Brief: Habitica is a revolutionary mobile application that transforms personal productivity into a role-playing game. Designed with an imaginative universe where your real-life actions influence your in-game avatar, it integrates task completion with gaming fun. Embark on quests, join guilds, and earn rewards as you strike off your daily tasks, habits, and to-dos.
